scenario_text.value: Hurry! This way!
Stop! I can’t run any more!

Hold it right there, you filthy monster
handler!
Ow! Hey! That hurts! Let me go!
Hands off, you creep!
Shut up, you damn monster!
Argh!
Stop! Don’t you hurt him!
That’s my friend!

Hmph! You should’ve just come quietly!
Dangerous elements must be isolated!
No! Somebody, help me!
Don’t try to resist!
Stop! You’re hurting me!

Shut up! I don’t know why we don’t just kill
you freaks.
Urgh...! If only I was stronger!
You let go of that kid right now.

What?! Who are you?! Back off! I can have you
all arrested for obstructing an officer!

Looks like there’s no talking to this one,
Takuma. Let’s get this over with.
*sigh*... Yeah, okay.
What are you babbling on ab—
Rrk!
That’s that!
All right, let’s get this kid out of here.

Hold on, Takuma, I’m getting a call from the
others.

Heheheh. My info was spot on, wasn’t it?
How’d it go? Everything okay?
Yeah, it went fine. We’re about to pull out.
You didn’t go too far again, did you, Kaito?

Hey! I never go too far! I beat the guy up
nice and gently.
You’re not supposed to beat people up at all!
I wish you’d get over that temper of yours!

Remember what the professor said? If you keep
taking risks, eventually you’ll pay—

Yeah, sorry, but we’ve still gotta bring this
kid in. Bye!
Wait, Kaito—

Phew... She never shuts up, it’s so annoying.
Where does she even get that from?

Hahah... But she has gotten a lot more
reliable.

Apparently she’s been in touch with the
professor a lot lately, asking about things.
Yeah, that bugs me too.

I mean, sure, with the doorway open she can
call the professor up any time, but still.

He’s gotta be busy with his own stuff, right?
Why can’t she just talk to me...
Um...who are you people?

Oh, sorry to ignore you like that. Don’t
worry. We’re here to help.
But...
Here, does this explain things?
See? No need to worry!

Kaito, let me take a crack at that bad guy
too!

No way! If we overdo it again, Miu will never
let me hear the end of it.
Are you...the same as us?

Listen, I’m sure you must have been through
a lot, but don’t worry.

You’ve got lots of friends who are just like
you all over the world.

So keep those spirits up. Now, we’re going to
take you back to your mom and dad.

You can’t... Both my parents got taken away
to the camp.
They did, huh?
Well, would you like to get them back?
I’d love to! Only I’m not strong enough...

Well, if you come with us, we can teach you
how to be strong.
Huh?

That way you’ll definitely be able to save
them someday.

All right, take me with you! It’s okay if
I bring my friend, right?
Of course!
We’ve got a lot to teach you.
Yeah, come on! You’re both with us now!

(We’ve formed a group of people with partners
to fight against oppressive governments.)

(We also work to support confused kids who’ve
just met their own partners.)

(Because we never want anything like the
tragedy we lived through to play out again.)

(We don’t want anyone else to have to go
through what Aoi did.)

Takuma, we need to get moving. They’ll be
onto us soon.
Right, let’s go.

(We’d returned to find the world in disarray.
Who knows what lies ahead now?)

(I know it’s not going to be easy to bring
order back to all this chaos, but even so...)
Hey, Kaito...
What?

Let’s try to build that ideal world Aoi
wanted...where everyone can live in harmony.
Yeah, already on it.

She was only really mistaken in her methods.
Her goal and her reasoning were sound.

So we gotta find our own way to make her
ideal world a reality.
Right!

(That’s just one more reason why we’ve got to
keep fighting...)

(...and believing that one day this long
struggle will come to an end.)

(Until then, we will continue to look forward
and hope, without ever giving in.)
